name: gatsby-starter-nehalem
description: A starter for the Gatsby Nehalem theme

scripts.build: cp content/assets/images/cinamonroll.png node_modules/@nehalist/gatsby-theme-nehalem/logo.png && cp content/assets/images/cinamonroll.png node_modules/@nehalist/gatsby-theme-nehalem/assets/nehalist-gatsby.png && gatsby build
